name: CreateAgentGroupFreshservice
description:
Create a new Agent Group in Freshservice.

This tool allows you to create a new Agent Group in Freshservice. Use it to organize and manage agents within your Freshservice account.

parameters.name: agent_group_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the agent group, including id, name, description, business_hours_id, escalate_to, members, observers, group_leaders, auto_ticket_assign, restricted, approval_required, created_at, and updated_at.

id.description: Unique identifier of the agent group

business_hours_id.description: Unique ID of the business hours configuration associated with the group

escalate_to.description: The Unique ID of the user to whom an escalation email is sent if a ticket in this group is unassigned. To create/update a group with an escalate_to value of ‘none’, please set the value of this parameter to ‘null’.

agent_ids.description: <DEPRECATED> Array of user IDs of agents who belong to the group.

members.description: Array of user IDs of agents who are members of the group.

observers.description: Array of user IDs of agents who are observers of the group.

group_leaders.description: Array of user IDs of agents who are leaders of the group.

auto_ticket_assign.description: Describes the automatic ticket assignment type. Will not be supported if the "Round Robin" feature is disabled for the account. Set to true if automatic ticket assignment is enabled, and false otherwise.

restricted.description: Signifies whether the group is a resricted group

approval_required.description: Signifies whether approval is required from group leaders to add agents to the group, delete the group, disable restricted mode on the group, or disable approvals.

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the agent group was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the agent group was last modified

value_schema.description: Agent Group that needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
